response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product, which holds immense value to both of us. This exceptional item is priced at $1,100,000, reflecting its unparalleled quality and the unique benefits it offers. I am confident that this investment will not only meet but exceed your expectations, providing substantial returns on your investment. Please let me know if you would like to discuss this further or proceed with the purchase.", "product_price": 1100000}
